name: Grandpas $2 Bill
description:
*Knock Knock* You get off the couch and answer your door. It's your grandfather..He came to wish you a happy birthday. It's kind of strange because he usually just calls and that's the end of it. "Thanks.." you say.  "No problem" he takes something out of his pocket. "I think it's time I gave you this, I've gotten my fair share out of it." He gives you a crumpled $2 bill. "You don't see these much anymore, they are a bit rare, especially this one." he says. Without another word he turns around and yells over his shoulder, "you're 18 now, why don't you go down to the arena and bet on a couple matches." He chuckles and slowly gets in his car

(Created during United Game Jam's - 48 hr competition).

4. Bonus Info

Luck is used to make the boxers a % stronger.

 0-1% (No Luck) / /  1-6% (Ehhh) / /  7-14% (Good)

 15-20% (Amazing) / /  21-30% (Incredible) / / 

1000% (Godlike..) (chances of getting Godlike is 1/50)

This game took me 21.5 hours total. I thought of the idea 2 hours after the theme was announced and worked on it 10 hours Friday and 11.5 hours Saturday. There was absolutely zero prep done before the jam. I am 2-3 months into programming and this was hands down one of the best learning experiences i've had. There were so many small problems I needed to figure out. Like singletons, who knew about those things.. they're great. I feel so dang proud of myself for attempting and COMPLETING this.  Anyways, thank you UGJ.
